description: This file defines theme-related classes for a Flutter app, including color tokens and theme data for light and dark modes, as well as a change notifier for theme management.

classes.name: AppTokens
classes.description: A class containing static constants defining color tokens used throughout the app's theme.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class providing theme data (dark and light) for the app, with helper method to access the current theme instance.

methods.name: dark
methods.description: A getter that returns ThemeData configured for a dark theme, including color scheme and text styles.

methods.name: light
methods.description: A getter that returns ThemeData for a light theme, based on the dark theme but with brightness adjusted.

methods.name: of
methods.description: A static method to retrieve the current AppTheme instance from BuildContext, falling back to a new instance if none is provided.
